about_the_game:
YOU ARE THE VILLAGE'S LAST HOPE.
Play as a hero and save the village from the Dark Bosses.
Take on creatures, master new powers and defeat bosses.

FACE THE CREATURES
Fight legendary creatures such as Golems and Slimes in fast-paced melee battles where you must combine your skills and weapons.

USE YOUR ABILITIES
Use your skills to defeat mythical monsters and explore the huge game world.

name: TreamLand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 @ 3.5 Ghz or Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 280x (3 GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD R9 280x (3 GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: AMD FX 8350 @ 4.0 Ghz or Intel Core i7-3770 @ 3.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 290 (4 GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD R9 290 (4 GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4GB)

short_description: "TreamLand" brings a great adventure to life. Play as a hero on a mission to save the village and escape from the island.
